name: Camper Carriers
description:
GGJ 2019 - "What home means to you?" - our loosely take on the topic. Made in less than 48h at Poznan Game Jam site.

  • Party version should work on 2 year old notebooks and all PCs.
  • Updated version was tested only on i3-7100, 8GiB, M2, GeForce 1050 2GiB).

Code and compiled on GodotEngine 3.1-beta3

Code: https://github.com/P1X-in/camper-carrier
Team: https://p1x.in/team/
